answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Gregory, 
Unfortunately we do not have a survey exactly as your specified in your question at this time. However we do have many surveys about customer satisfaction. There is an "Internal Customer Satisfaction Survey" icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/14044 and a "Citizen Satisfaction Survey Questions" 
Citizen Satisfaction Survey Questions | icma.org
Jun 14, 2012 ... My organization has been tasked with updating the "Citizen Satisfaction Survey" ( the last one was administered in 2008) and part of our task is ...
icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21956. I think by combining these two surveys and tweaking the questions you would be able to create the type of survey you described. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member who is looking for examples of surveys where the service provider/host community surveys the organizations served to gain feedback and evaluate the services provided (i.e. dispatch).  I am looking for survey examples.  Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
title: Surveying Shared Service Organizations
